title: Ulara
description: NB: This book is now published as Beautifully Wild.An exciting new adventure romance from best selling author Leesa Bow.EdenI’ve always been the obedient daughter.The good girl who followed the rules.But there was something missing—I’m torn between the safe path and breaking free.The ideal opportunity to spread my wings came in the form of a South American holiday.Within days, I was living in a culture vastly different to my sheltered upbringing.I found adventure. Confidence. Excitement.In a city of love and heartbreak, I experienced both.I wasn’t searching for the man of my dreams.He found me.Then he disappeared...Samuel is hiding a secret and I’m determined to find answers.Even if it meant doing the one thing my father warned me not to do—enter the jungle.I wasn't prepared for what awaited me. And I won't come out the same.Ulara is a story about forbidden love and a tortured hero, set between Australia and South America.*Does not contain a cliffhanger ending.
author: Leesa Bow
